title: Number of hospitals in Canada by province 2016
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of establishments in the y axis.
Month Ontario has the highest Number of establishments and Yukon has the lowest Number of establishments.
There is a difference of 491.0 between the maximum Month Ontario and minimum Month Yukon.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of establishments in the y axis.
The Number of establishments is appeared to be the highest at Month Ontario and lowest at Month Yukon.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of establishments in the y axis.
Month Ontario has the highest Number of establishments and Yukon has the lowest Number of establishments.
There is a difference of 491.0 between the maximum Month Ontario and minimum Month Yukon.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of establishments in the y axis.
The Number of establishments is appeared to be the highest at Month Ontario and lowest at Month Yukon.
Second maximum Number of establishments is found at Month Quebec.
The Number of establishments of Month Yukon is 492.0% smaller than the maximum value at Ontario.
Number of establishments at Month Ontario is 492.0 , second place is Quebec at 267.0, and thirdly is British Columbia at 206.0.
Over the past 13 Months, the Number of establishments has lowered.
Month Northwest Territories, and Nunavut have a similar Number of establishments that is 19.0.
The Month Yukon has 4.36 times less Number of establishments than average.
